main_components: Increasing the supply of SME credit (to SME entrepreneurs via Participatory Financing Institutions - PFIs) through an innovative auctions that will allow the banks to factor the higher costs of SME loans.; Strengthening the supply of creditworthy SMEs through support to three of Sri Lanka’s most dynamic industry clusters.; Expanding the PFIs outreach to underserved SMEs; Providing business development training and capacity training for women entrepreneurs (under attached TA); Strengthening the competitiveness of IT-BPO cluster through an International marketing campaign (under attached TA).
